entry.title: Tree-chains preliminary summary
entry.summary: Peter Todd responded to a request by Mark Friedenbach, posted on bitcoin-development, for a summary description of tree-chains. In his response, Peter Todd provided an introduction to tree-chains and also included links to references regarding chain-to-chain transfers and SPV proofs. He also gave a link to the email thread for those who had issues with unicode. Additionally, he signed off his message with his signature.asc.
